Name: Scrambled Eggs
Prep: Melt butter in pan over medium heat. Whisk eggs, salt and pepper in bowl. Pour in egg mixture. As eggs begin to cook, move around with a spatula. Cook until no liquid egg visible.

Name: Grilled Cheese
Prep: Preheat panover medium heat. Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place 1 slice of bread butter-side-down onto pan and add 1 slice of cheese. Butter a second slice of bread on one side and place butter-side-up on top of cheese. Fry until lightly browned and flip over. Continue until cheese is melted.

Name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: 1 frozen banana, 1 cup strawberries, ½ cup Greek yogurt, 1 cup unsweetened milk of choice
Prep: Add all of the ingredients to blender. Blend until smooth or about 1 minute on medium/medium-high speed.
